products.name: Handwoven Berber Carpet
products.description: Authentic handwoven Berber carpet with traditional geometric patterns. Made from high-quality wool by skilled artisans in Kairouan. Each carpet tells a unique story through its intricate designs.

products.name: Traditional Nabeul Pottery Vase
products.description: Beautiful hand-painted ceramic vase from Nabeul, featuring traditional Tunisian motifs in blue and white. Perfect for home decoration or as a unique gift.

products.name: Berber Silver Necklace
products.description: Authentic Berber silver necklace with traditional coral and amber stones. Handcrafted by skilled silversmiths using techniques passed down through generations.

products.name: Harissa Spice Blend
products.description: Authentic Tunisian harissa spice blend made from premium red peppers, garlic, and traditional spices. Perfect for adding heat and flavor to your dishes.

attributes.ingredients: Red Peppers, Garlic, Coriander, Caraway, Salt

products.name: Handcrafted Leather Bag
products.description: Elegant handcrafted leather handbag made from premium Tunisian leather. Features traditional tooled designs and brass hardware. Perfect for daily use or special occasions.

products.name: Traditional Wood Carving
products.description: Intricate hand-carved wooden panel featuring traditional Islamic geometric patterns. Made from olive wood by master craftsmen. A beautiful piece of Tunisian artistry.

products.name: Merguez Spice Mix
products.description: Authentic spice blend for making traditional Tunisian merguez sausages. Contains fennel, coriander, chili, and other aromatic spices in perfect proportions.

products.name: Tunisian Silk Scarf
products.description: Luxurious silk scarf with traditional Tunisian patterns. Hand-printed using natural dyes. Soft, elegant, and perfect for any season.
